scripts.build-local: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs local
scripts.build-dev: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs dev
scripts.build-dev-webpack: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs dev-webpack
scripts.build-demo-01: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs demo-01
scripts.build-demo-02: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs demo-02
scripts.build-demo-03: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs demo-03
scripts.build-demo-04: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs demo-04
scripts.build-demo-05: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs demo-05
scripts.build-prod: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/build.cjs prod
scripts.build-setup-demo-01: git status && git checkout sandbox/DEMO-01 && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-demo-01 && open .
scripts.build-setup-demo-02: git status && git checkout sandbox/DEMO-02 && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-demo-02 && open .
scripts.build-setup-demo-03: git status && git checkout sandbox/DEMO-03 && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-demo-03 && open .
scripts.build-setup-demo-04: git status && git checkout sandbox/DEMO-04 && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-demo-04 && open .
scripts.build-setup-demo-05: git status && git checkout sandbox/DEMO-05 && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-demo-05 && open .
scripts.build-setup-dev: git status && git checkout develop && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-dev && open .
scripts.build-setup-prod: git status && git checkout main && git pull && yarn install; true && yarn build-prod && open .
scripts.compile-dev: cd ../.. && yarn compile && cd packages/browserExtension && yarn build-dev
scripts.start: yarn precompile && yarn compile && node utils/webserver.cjs
